name: CPGEnabled
title: CPG Enabled Extension
description: Determines whether the artifact on which it appears is Enabled, as opposed to just Known.

element.definition: Determines whether the artifact on which it appears is Enabled, as opposed to just Known.
element.comment: Systems that are capable of storing and retrieving knowledge artifacts SHALL use this element to distinguish between a Known and an actively Enabled artifact. Behavior described by the artifact should only be implemented if this element is present and has a value of true.
